tests.testSummary: This test ensures that the server's configurations contains the values required by the specifications, check_session_iframe and end_session_endpoint.

This test performs a normal authorization flow at the OP, then sends the user to the end_session_endpoint, and uses check_session_iframe to check the session state before and after the logout.

If using static client registration you must register a post_logout_redirect_uri, the same url as the redirect url but replacing the portion after the alias with '/post_logout_redirect'.

Please note that this test may not work in some browsers.
